meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of achondrites.
meanings.sent1: The achondritic rock had a smooth texture.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the achondritic meteorite carefully.
meanings.sent3: The achondritic stone rolled down the hill with ease.
meanings.sent4: Her achondritic personality made her stand out in a crowd.
meanings.sent5: The achondritic surface of the moon reflected the sunlight brightly.

meanings.sent1: The achondritic sample puzzled the geologist.
meanings.sent2: The achondritic composition of the rock was unusual.
meanings.sent3: The achondritic puzzle was missing a crucial piece.
meanings.sent4: Her achondritic behavior at the party raised some eyebrows.
meanings.sent5: The achondritic nature of the soil made it difficult for plants to grow.
